import React, { useState } from 'react' import "../App.css" import Footer from './Footer' import Grid from './Grid' import Middle from './Middle' function Intro() { let alert=document.getElementById("alert") console.log(alert) const [email,setEmail]=useState(" ") const [message,setMessage]=useState(message? null :"please enter correct email") const validateEmail=(email)=>{ const pattern= /^([A-Za-z0-9_\-\.])+\@([A-Za-z0-9_\-\.])+\.([A-Za-z]{2,4})$/; const result= pattern.test(email) if(result === true) return null else{ setMessage("Please enter correct email") } } return ( <>

{setEmail(e.target.value)}} id="email" placeholder="email@example.com"/> {message}
) } export default Intro
